title: Curious with Name changes, Especially with inactive accounts
body:
Hey peeps, this is just  a enquiry and no form of hate, but i've always been curious with inactive accounts and good names, is there any way to get the original name?
for example this account hasn't played at all recently according to op.gg and i've just wondered if inactive accounts eventually get name changed automatically.

replies.body:
Howdy, 
you can also use sites like [**THIS**](https://lolnames.gg/en/) to check as well ❤

>* Each Summoner name will have 6 months of inactivity protection upon creation.
* Each Summoner name will earn an additional month of inactivity protection for each Summoner level above 6, up to 30 months.
* Inactivity is defined to be a period in which no games of any kind have been played on the account.
* When inactivity protection expires, your name will be available to be claimed through the Summoner name Change service in the store.


https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Inactive-Summoner-name-rules
